message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your position, but the value of this product is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $10,500 is still a bit high for me. How about we try $9,800?
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible here, but I need to get a fair price.  Would you consider $10,200?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $10,200 is still a bit high for me. How about we try $9,500?
